title: Just Say No

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **During** the game, you may undo any event that occurs, this processes immediately. You may be alive or dead, and may do this twice per game.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__ If part of the Daily Streak faction, you may only undo your own death if dead. All other actions while dead cannot be taken.

desc:
Post 4751
*You can't be murdered if you don't give consent.*
